title: LF 2 sliver players ADC/Supp for clash.
body: Post your rank and IGN, must be available for clash.

replies.body:
Support, Silver 1 flex Silver 2 solo duo

Main Braum, Tahm Kench and janna but i have experience with pretty much all supports

IGN: Spellhowler 

:)
Dirty Moe Plat 5 will play adc. I'm at silver skill level so we should be good
